mapper.select: select w.no, w.title, m.NAME, w.recommend, w.accept from wishbook w, member m where w.MEMBER_NO = m.NO order by w.recommend desc
select w.title, w.publisher, w.reason, to_char(w.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, w.recommend, w.accept, m.name from wishbook w, member m where w.MEMBER_NO=m.NO and w.no=#{no}
select w.no, w.title, m.NAME, w.recommend, to_char(w.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, w.accept from wishbook w, member m where w.MEMBER_NO = m.NO order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into book values(seq_book.nextval, #{title}, 0, '', (select no from publisher where title=(select publisher from wishbook where no=#{no})), null)
insert into wishbook values( seq_wishbook.nextval, #{title}, #{publisher}, #{reason}, sysdate, 0, 0, #{memberNo})

update wishbook set accept=2 where no=#{no}
